document_notes.text:
This update for memcached fixes the following issues:

Security issue fixed:

- CVE-2019-11596: Fixed a NULL pointer dereference in process_lru_command (bsc#1133817).
- CVE-2019-15026: Fixed a stack-based buffer over-read (bsc#1149110).
document_notes.title: Details

notes.text: In memcached before 1.5.14, a NULL pointer dereference was found in the "lru mode" and "lru temp_ttl" commands. This causes a denial of service when parsing crafted lru command messages in process_lru_command in memcached.c.
notes.title: Vulnerability Description

SUSE Linux Enterprise Software Development Kit 12 SP5:memcached-devel-1.4.39-4.11.2

description.text: To install this SUSE Security Update use the SUSE recommended installation methods like YaST online_update or "zypper patch".

notes.text: memcached 1.5.16, when UNIX sockets are used, has a stack-based buffer over-read in conn_to_str in memcached.c.
notes.title: Vulnerability Description
